Reviews.Title: Great Phone!!
Reviews.Author: Manuel Suarez
Reviews.Content: So far a very good experience with this phone. Quad core processor make it so much easier, also great definition 'cause the FHD screen.

Reviews.Title: baby I want to buy it
Reviews.Author: Silvia Vasquez
Reviews.Content: I really want this phone, I hope that it can have kikat and a processor very fast and very resistant to the impact of the floor

ProductInfo.Features:
5.0 Inch IPS, capacitive touch Screen
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 pixels
MTK6589T, Cortex A7 quad core, 1.5GHz
Android 4.2.1 OS, 16GB ROM
Dual Cameras, front camera 13.0MP, back camera 13.0MP with flashlight
ProductInfo.Name: ThL W11 Monkey King Smartphone Quad core 5.0 Inch FHD Screen 13.0MP Front Camera MTK6589T 16GB ROM Android 4.2
